columns.building_id: A unique identifier for each building in the database.
columns.Name: The official name of the building.
columns.Street_address: The detailed street address where the building is located.
columns.Years_as_tallest: The span of years during which the building held the title of the tallest building.
columns.Height_feet: The height of the building measured in feet.
columns.Floors: The total number of floors within the building.

building.table_description: The building table contains information about various buildings, including their identification, names, locations, historical significance in terms of height, and structural details.

columns.Institution_id: A unique identifier for each institution.
columns.Location: The geographical location where the institution is situated.
columns.Founded: The year the institution was established.
columns.Type: The classification type of the institution (e.g., Public, Private, Tribal).
columns.Enrollment: The number of students currently enrolled in the institution.
columns.Team: The name of the sports team associated with the institution.
columns.Primary_Conference: The main athletic conference or league in which the institution participates.
columns.building_id: A foreign key that references the associated building for the institution.

Institution.table_description: The Institution table provides detailed information about various educational institutions, including their identifiers, names, locations, establishment years, classifications, enrollment figures, athletic teams, conference affiliations, and associated buildings.

columns.common_name: The widely recognized name of the protein source organism.
columns.protein_name: The specific name of the protein, often indicating its function or characteristics.
columns.divergence_from_human_lineage: A numerical value indicating the evolutionary divergence of the protein from the human lineage.
columns.accession_number: A unique identifier assigned to the protein sequence by a database.
columns.Institution_id: A reference code linking the protein to the associated research or educational institution.
columns.sequence_identity_to_human_protein: The percentage similarity of the protein sequence to its human protein counterpart.
columns.sequence_length: The total number of amino acids in the protein sequence.

protein.table_description: The protein table contains detailed information about various proteins derived from different organisms, including their common names, a description of their properties, and relevant institutional affiliations.
